channel.title: Shops
channel.description: i wanna add a rare shop but i wanna make it only buyable with 2b tickets not cash how do i make an item or shop that can only be bought by another item

i dont want it to accept coins and tickets just tickets like if a phat is priced 10b you can have 10b in coins only 2147m so i wanna make it where it can accept 5 tickets which is 10b

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Iâ€™m not sure how you would make a shop accept coins and tickets in the same shop. However you can make a new shop and make it accept tokens, just copy your tokkul code in your shop assistant class and change that up to make it accept tickets. If your base is project insanity I can probably help you out more if you need it.
